en.today: A rare cosmic kite graces our skies today, dear Aries, as the Capricorn moon, Venus, Saturn, nodes of fate, and Uranus align. Now is the time to consider how your internal dialogue and external world align. Lock into your biggest hopes and dreams by getting organized and maintaining a positive outlook. Plan on embracing hard work, but be flexible with your strategies moving forward. You'll crave a change of scenery once Luna enters Aquarius this evening, entering a t-square with the sun and Mars. Plan on socializing or embracing a personal project, but avoid comparing yourself to others. Transformative conversations and empowering ideas find you later tonight when the moon aspects Mercury and Pluto.

en.today: You'll feel ready to release dead weight, dear Leo, as the Capricorn moon, Venus, Saturn, nodes of fate, and Uranus form a rare cosmic kite. Focus on what brings a sense of emotional security and overall wellness, setting boundaries against anyone or anything that does not. The energy brings more balance and control once Luna enters Aquarius. However, a harsh t-square with the sun and Mars suggests that loved ones may challenge your efforts. Use open and honest communication when the moon, Mercury, and Pluto activate tonight, putting in the work to ensure your relationships stay strong and positive.

en.today: Embrace personal exploration today, darling Taurus, as the Capricorn moon, Venus, Saturn, nodes of fate, and Uranus form a rare cosmic kite. This energy is perfect for breaking molds and searching for inspiration, following your intuition toward adventure and personal development. You'll shift gears once Luna enters Aquarius, causing you to look toward the future from a more practical lens. A tense t-square between Luna, the sun, and Mars could cause emotions to fray this evening, but try not to be reactive if a conflict arises. Embrace quiet and reflect on your situation when Luna, Pluto, and Mercury activate later tonight.

en.today: The Capricorn moon enters a rare kite formation with Venus, Saturn, nodes of fate, and Uranus today, dearest Gemini. With an abundance of activity happening overhead, it'll be important that your mind is in the right place. Give yourself the freedom to change directions, release what is not serving you, and fully devote yourself to reaching higher ground. Your luck increases once Luna enters Aquarius, though a tense t-square with the sun and Mars cautions against speaking or acting impulsively. Pull back to reflect on what you desire most, asking the other side for guidance when the moon, Mercury, and Pluto activate tonight.

kh.today: មួក Capricorn ចូលក្នុងការបង្កើតខ្លែងដ៏កម្រមួយជាមួយ Venus Venus, Saturn, ថ្នាំងថ្នាំងនៃជោគវាសនានិងអ៊ុយរ៉ានុសសព្វថ្ងៃនេះ Gemini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់បំផុត។ជាមួយនឹងសកម្មភាពដ៏បរិបូរណ៍ដែលកំពុងកើតឡើងពីលើវានឹងសំខាន់ណាស់ដែលថាចិត្តរបស់អ្នកស្ថិតនៅកន្លែងដែលត្រឹមត្រូវ។ផ្តល់ឱ្យខ្លួនអ្នកនូវសេរីភាពក្នុងការផ្លាស់ប្តូរទិសដៅចេញផ្សាយនូវអ្វីដែលមិនបម្រើអ្នកហើយលះបង់ខ្លួនឯងឱ្យបានពេញលេញដើម្បីឈានដល់ទីខ្ពស់។សំណាងរបស់អ្នកកើនឡើងនៅពេលដែល Luna ចូលទៅក្នុង Aquarius ទោះបីជា T-Somets តានតឹងជាមួយនឹងព្រះអាទិត្យនិងភពព្រះអង្គារប្រយ័ត្នប្រយែងប្រឆាំងនឹងការនិយាយឬធ្វើសកម្មភាពដោយមិនអនុគ្រោះ។ទាញត្រឡប់មកវិញដើម្បីឆ្លុះបញ្ចាំងពីអ្វីដែលអ្នកចង់បានបំផុតដោយស្នើសុំការណែនាំផ្សេងទៀតសម្រាប់ការណែនាំនៅពេលព្រះច័ន្ទបារតនិងផ្លាតូធ្វើឱ្យសកម្មនៅយប់នេះ។
